Headline: Loop-bound Orange Line Service Delayed near Cermak
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Orange Line trains are still standing near Cermak due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Orange Line trains are still standing near Cermak due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include:

  • #62 Archer buses

Also, as a result of the delay, shuttle buses are requested to provide connecting service between Midway and Roosevelt, in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
